text:
Crowdcube London & Cardiff Full Time

Crowdcube is the world's leading equity crowdfunding platform. We enable incredible businesses to get their ideas off the ground and grow. We're looking for: - Full Stack engineers with solid JavaScript skills and a desire to work with React and Node. - Php Engineers keen to work with Laravel

We're looking for engineers to help us continue our growth and our expansion into new markets. We need to enable our team to build and deliver quickly and safely on our ambitious plans. This is more than just a coding role. You will be part of a team who sets out what we build and how. You will be influencing discussions around architecture and will play a key part in conversations about the evolution of the platform. Collaboration is really important to us!

You can check Crowdcube out here:https://www.crowdcube.com/

If you're interested in finding out more, you can email me at carly@crowdcube.com

Cheers
